TopicTitle: [Tutorial] Changing names of kerbals + respawn after they die

Please, be careful!

In this .cfg you will see how do you can change totally kerbals.... go to the last paragraph of the .cfg file (This need to be opened with notepad/wordpad

You will find this example : Change name... character and... special... and see "state = 0" HE'S spawned and ready for mission "state = 1" He's in a ship and state = 2/3 (They're gone). If it isn't say CREW and says RECRUIT it's ready in astronaut complex. That's all! The last is edited by me

any idea what "BadS =" is? Jeb is True where Bill Bob are False.
"BadS", "brave", and "dumb" refer to the kerbonaut's stats. Brave and dumb are the two bar graphs, "Courage" and "Stupidity". BadS controls whether the kerbonaut grins no matter what the situation, or if he gets unhappy when he thinks things are going wrong.

Try saying Bad-S out loud, and you'll get the idea.
